title: Fix Terraform DNS config: hcloud_zone doesn't support inline rrsets blocks
description: The terraform/dns/main.tf uses dynamic rrsets blocks inside hcloud_zone resource, but this isn't supported by the hetznercloud/hcloud provider. DNS records need to be created as separate hcloud_zone_record resources. GitHub Actions workflow dns-management.yml fails on terraform validate.

title: Rollback: Traefik dual certresolver (Cloudflare + Hetzner)
description:
If Traefik cert issues occur after deploying dual resolvers, rollback with:

1. cp infrastructure/base/traefik/helmchartconfig.yaml.backup infrastructure/base/traefik/helmchartconfig.yaml
2. git checkout -- infrastructure/base/traefik/kustomization.yaml apps/base/wp-ai-chatbot-redirect/ingress.yaml
3. rm infrastructure/base/traefik/hetzner-secret.yaml
4. git add -A && git commit -m 'Rollback Traefik dual certresolver' && git push
5. flux reconcile kustomization flux-system --with-source

Backup file: infrastructure/base/traefik/helmchartconfig.yaml.backup
